sourceMeaningMnemonic: There's a <radical>slide</radical> with a <radical>drunkard</radical> <radical>above</radical> it, and they're making you feel <radical>small</radical>. And the worst part is that the drunkard is one of your <kanji>relatives</kanji>.
meaningInfo: A slide isn't the safest place for a drunkard to be. You try to help your relative down but they just keep shouting at you and making you feel small. Drunk relatives are the worst.
readingMnemonic: As if things couldn't get worse, your relative seems to think they're <reading>sexy</reading> (<ja>せき</ja>) when they're on the slide drunk. Sexy? More like irresponsible!
readingInfo: Imagine your intoxicated relative shouting about how sexy they are on that slide. Someone get them down from there!
